Reviews.Title: LG VX9400 cell phone
Reviews.Author: danette miller
Reviews.Content: I have had this style of phone sence it came out (years ago)! I really love this phone, but the new phone I got was a rebuilt..... not to happy with it! It keeps turning off? No matter how long I have charged it for....Disappointed with this phone.....but, if I can find another phone like this,(THAT WORKS), I will get it in a heart beat!!!

Reviews.Title: Broken
Reviews.Author: NightmareTheCat ":3"
Reviews.Content: I received a broken phone. I have already sent it back and it was received. I just had to find a different phone that would work with my service provider.

Reviews.Title: not satifactory
Reviews.Author: Troy D. Waterman
Reviews.Content: did not like this product because i got locked out and it asked me for a cell number i did not have because it did not come with any book let or instructions manuel.

Reviews.Title: phone is ok
Reviews.Author: sf
Reviews.Content: The phone is ok...No speaker which is important to me (I should have checked).  The battery life is horrible.  It's good enough for my 10 year old.I would have liked more information on the quality of this product

Reviews.Title: unhappy.
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: battery will not hold a charge. a new battery is 40 dollars which is more than i paid for the phone.

Reviews.Title: l love it
Reviews.Author: jammie mcknight
Reviews.Content: she love it in her friend did to  its a good phone and I love it the most love it

Reviews.Title: A Nice Phone Moreso When Unlocked
Reviews.Author: S. W. Burris "That guy"
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone to replace a RAZR phone for my sister.It has a nice clear screen a lighted keyboard and an easily heard ringer.If you need an unlocked phone to use with a carrier like Pageplus,I would easily recommend this one.
